description:
Mortal Gods is a Skirmish-level game of Bronze Age combat set in the Mediterranean! Pick an ancient Greek City-State and set off for glory in this modern take on classic combat. 

Check out Footsore's products HERE https://footsoreminiatures.co.uk/pages/a-reintroduction-to-mortal-gods

If you're after fiction in the period check out Christian Cameron's books HERE https://christiancameronauthor.com/my-books/

Thanks to Les for bringing in his collection for us to check out!

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/acces
title: Let's Play! - Mortal Gods by Footsore Miniatures
